speaker: President.
english: President. Thank you very much, Mrs Miguélez. I take good note of your complaint. I shall pass it on to the head of Parliament’s security service so that he may take the appropriate action.
original: President. Thank you very much, Mrs Miguélez. I take good note of your complaint. I shall pass it on to the head of Parliament’s security service so that he may take the appropriate action.
agenda_item: Removal of fins of sharks on board vessels (debate)
